dcterms:creator: S. Narayan
S. B. Cohen
M. Lapata
dcterms:description: The BBC Extreme Summarization Task (XSUM) involves summarizing documents into single-sentence summaries, requiring high levels of abstraction and document-level inference.
dcterms:title: BBC Extreme Summarization Task (XSUM)

dcterms:creator: J. Maynez
S. Narayan
B. Bohnet
R. McDonald
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of manually annotated document-summary pairs used to evaluate the faithfulness of generated summaries.
dcterms:title: Manually Annotated Document-Summary Pairs for Faithfulness

dcterms:creator: M. A. Hermann
T. Kocisky
E. Grefenstette
L. Espeholt
W. Kay
M. Suleyman
P. Blunsom
dcterms:description: The CNN/DailyMail dataset consists of news articles paired with human-written summaries, primarily used for training and evaluating summarization models.
dcterms:title: CNN/DailyMail Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Geva
E. Malmi
I. Szpektor
J. Berant
dcterms:description: The DiscoFuse dataset is designed for discourse-based sentence fusion, containing pairs of sentences that can be fused into a single coherent sentence.
dcterms:title: DiscoFuse Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. A. Botha
M. Faruqui
J. Alex
J. Baldridge
D. Das
dcterms:description: The WikiSplit dataset consists of examples of sentence splits extracted from Wikipedia edit history, used for training models to split and rephrase sentences.
dcterms:title: WikiSplit Dataset
